cv.description: Discover my professional journey, education, and skills. This CV provides an overview of my experience and qualifications.

cv.personalBio: I'm a licensed English teacher with a passion for teaching and helping students of all ages and levels improve their English skills. My teaching style is dynamic, supportive, and focused on building confidence in language learners.

experience.title: English Teacher, Colegio Primavera
experience.description: Taught English to middle and high school students. Developed engaging lesson plans, implemented interactive speaking activities, and promoted a positive classroom environment.

experience.title: English Teacher, Colegio Horizonte
experience.description: Delivered English language instruction to primary and secondary students. Organized extracurricular English conversation clubs and prepared students for language exams.

education.course: Bachelor's Degree in English Language Teaching
education.note: Learned the fundamentals of English language teaching, methodology, and classroom management.
